Headline: Updated: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Cottage Grove

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress Parkway, Racine and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at California due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at California due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
